Rebirth Manager
A rebirth can be performed to obtain a book of rebirth. A character can perform 3 rebirths.
A book of rebirth can be used to create a Rebirth Cloak (with extraordinary skills).
A rebirth is a new birth, again you will become a novice player (level %level%), without any skills.
You will keep your items, class and rebirth skills. But be aware that if you have any enchanted skills, they will become +0.
Perform a rebirth
